(a sister concern of JMI Group) CSSD Assistant /Technician Application Deadline : 28 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Company Information Summary Vacancy: 03 Location: Dhaka Salary: Negotiable Published: 14 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements CSSD Assistant: 1+ year experience in hospital CSSD/OT support (preferred). CSSD Technician: 2тАУ3+ years hands-on CSSD experience. Experience in autoclave and sterilizer operation preferred. Responsibilities & Context Instrument Reprocessing Receive used instruments and devices from OT, wards, ICU, and other units. Perform proper sorting and segregation of instruments. Carry out manual and mechanical cleaning procedures. Operate ultrasonic cleaners and washerтАУdisinfectors where available. Inspect instruments for cleanliness, function, and damage. Sterilization Process Prepare, assemble, and pack instrument sets and trays. Operate sterilization equipment (autoclave, ETO, plasma, dry heat as applicable). Select correct sterilization cycle based on item type. Monitor sterilization parameters (time, temperature, pressure). Use and document chemical and biological indicators. Storage & Distribution Label sterile packs with date, batch, and expiry. Maintain sterile storage conditions as per protocol. Issue sterile supplies based on requisition. Maintain FIFO (First In First Out) system. Documentation & Quality Control Maintain sterilization logs and registers. Record load details and test results. Report sterilization failures or equipment malfunction immediately. Support audit and infection control checks. Infection Control & Safety Follow infection prevention and control (IPC) guidelines. Use PPE properly during all decontamination and sterilization work. Follow biomedical waste segregation rules. Ensure clean and dirty zone separation. Equipment Care Clean and maintain CSSD machines and work areas. Perform routine checks of autoclaves and sealing machines. Coordinate with maintenance for breakdowns. Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Job Location Dhaka Read Before Apply If you believe you are the right fit for the position, we encourage you to apply and become a part of our growing healthcare family. Send your updated CV to hrd-career@apollojmi.com or directly submit your CV to the Manager, Human Resources at our hospital address. JMI Specialized Hospital Limited. job_description: Executive - Industrial Engineering (IE) : Source One BD Limited (A Concern of Sterling Styles Limited) Jobs ENG ржмрж╛ржВрж▓рж╛ Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Source One BD Limited (A Concern of Sterling Styles Limited) Executive - Industrial Engineering (IE) Application Deadline : 10 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 1 Age: 26 to 32 years Location: Dhaka (Ashulia) Salary: Negotiable Published: 14 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 26 to 32 years Experience in the Tent manufacturing industry will be a plus. Candidates with Woven experience are also encouraged to apply. Responsibilities & Context We are a 100% export-oriented, reputed Tent Manufacturing Company looking to hire an Executive - Industrial Engineering (IE) for productivity improvement and efficient manufacturing operations. Job Responsibilities: Conduct time, capacity, and follow-up studies of running tent models (cutting, sewing, welding, fitting, assembly, finishing), set realistic line/section targets, and perform line balancing to improve efficiency and throughput. Plan and ensure line feeding per Operation Breakdown (OB) with proper manpower, machines, tools, jigs, and attachments; identify bottlenecks and take corrective actions. Maintain monthly skill matrices for operators and helpers, and lead skill development and multi-skilling initiatives. Analyze Non-Productive Time (NPT), identify root causes, and implement measures to reduce idle time and maximize output. Lead Lean Manufacturing projects (5S, Kaizen, waste reduction, flow improvement) to enhance efficiency and optimize costs. Finalize SMV and Operation Bulletin for all tent styles and buyer requirements with Production and Merchandising teams; monitor Man-Machine Ratio (MMR), Cost per Minute (CPM), productivity, and waste optimization. Conduct skill development training for supervisors and floor staff on IE tools, techniques, and productivity methods; evaluate training effectiveness and follow up. Prepare and present monthly KPI reports, efficiency analysis, and cost recovery reports for management review. Skills & Expertise communication and interpersonal skill. Cost Analysis Data analysis Industrial & Production Engineering Layout LEAN Manufacturing Line balancing Manpower management SMV Waste Management Compensation & Other Benefits Festival Bonus: 2 Salary Review: Yearly Attendance Bonus Other Benefits: As per company policy Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Gender Only males are allowed to apply. job_description: Accounts Assistant : Local Education and Economic Development Organization - LEEDO Jobs ENG ржмрж╛ржВрж▓рж╛ Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Local Education and Economic Development Organization - LEEDO Accounts Assistant Application Deadline : 28 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Age: 20 to 35 years Location: Dhaka (Bosila) Salary: Negotiable Published: 14 Feb 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 20 to 35 years Responsibilities & Context Position Summary The Accounts Assistant will be a key member of the Finance Team, responsible for maintaining high-quality financial records, ensuring procedural compliance, and supporting the day-to-day fiscal operations of the organization. This role requires a high degree of integrity, numerical accuracy and an understanding of NGO-specific financial regulations. Key Responsibilities Financial Documentation: Maintain and manage books of accounts (Cash Book, General Ledger) in strict compliance with Income Tax, VAT regulations and NGO Affairs Bureau guidelines. Transaction Management: Process, verify and input daily financial data into the accounting system with 100% accuracy. Banking & Payroll: Execute all banking transactions and assist in the preparation of monthly salary sheets and timely disbursement of staff benefits. Compliance & Reconciliation: Perform regular bank reconciliations and ensure all expenditures are backed by proper approvals and supporting vouchers. Audit Readiness: Support internal and external audit processes by organizing financial documents and addressing auditor queries promptly. Budgeting Assistance: Assist in the preparation of project-wise budgets and financial reports for donors and the NGO Affairs Bureau. Asset, Inventory & Stock Control: Monitor stock management processes and maintain updated registers for fixed assets and consumables. Reporting: Generate monthly financial statements and variance reports for management review to ensure goal alignment. Skills & Expertise Financial accounting Bank Reconciliation Payroll Processing Project Management NGO Project Management Accounts and audit Reporting and Documentation Fixed Asset Management Inventory Store Management Donor Relationship Management Compensation & Other Benefits Lunch Facilities: Full Subsidize Festival Bonus: 1 Snacks and Tea Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Job Location Dhaka (Bosila) Job Highlights Manage financial records, banking, payroll, and budgets for an NGO. Ensure compliance with tax and NGO regulations, support audits, control assets, stock and prepare accurate reports for management and donors. Read Before Apply Interested candidates who meet the criteria are invited to submit their CV along

Experience At least 5 years The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): Healthcare Startup Additional Requirements Age At most 40 years Proven 5+ years of experience in sales, preferably in healthcare, services, or startup environments. Strong leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills. Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment with minimal supervision. Familiarity with CRM systems and sales reporting tools. Responsibilities & Context Develop and execute strategic sales plans to achieve revenue targets and expand market presence. Manage and mentor a team of sales representatives and customer care executives. Identify new business opportunities and build partnerships with clinics, hospitals, and other referral sources. Prepare and present weekly performance reports to senior leadership. Any other task assigned by Management. Willingness to travel and work in the field. Strong teamwork and coordination skills. Understanding of results-based management (RBM) and logical frameworks. Basic photography and storytelling skills for documentation. Responsibilities & Context Job Location: The position is based in Assasuni Upazila of Satkhira district and with regular travel to outside of base station, District, Upazila and Union and level for implementation of project activities smoothly. Reporting To: Program Focal/Director Organization Overview: IDEAL (Institute of Development Education for Advancement of Landless) is a local NGO established in 1987 in the Parulia village of Debhata Upazila under Satkhira District of Bangladesh. In 1987, few young educated people formed IDEAL with a view to promote social activities. From the beginning, IDEAL started to organize local poor people into different homogenous groups with the objective to secure their rights and to help them assume responsibilities which would lead to their empowerment and promote self-employment. IDEAL started water and sanitation programs considering safe water crisis in the locality and lack of sanitation practices. Then it started social forestry program as part of its environmental conservation and poverty eradication program. Savings and micro-credit programs also started for employment generation and economic empowerment. Adult literacy and non-formal primary education programs started as part of basic education for the adult people and dropout children from the poor families especially girls. IDEAL took registration from department social welfare in 1991, NGO- AB in 1996 Department of Youth development in 2003 and Microcredit regulatory authority in 2008. job_description: Programme Policy Officer (Impact Evaluation), SC9, Dhaka : United Nations World Food Programme (WFP) Jobs ENG ржмрж╛ржВрж▓рж╛ Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List United Nations World Food Programme (WFP) Programme Policy Officer (Impact Evaluation), SC9, Dhaka Application Deadline : 21 Feb 2026 Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Company Information Summary Vacancy: 1 Location: Dhaka Published: 14 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements At least 7 years of overall experience, including 4 years of Professional Experience (managerial or supervisory) in areas related to Managing Impact Evaluations/ Outcome Surveys/Baseline-Endline studies of aid and development interventions in low- or middle-income countries. Within these 4 years of professional experience, a minimum of 3 years of experience must be after postgraduation. Responsibilities & Context BACKGROUND AND PURPOSE OF THE ASSIGNMENT Digital Financial Literacy and Social Behavioral Change Intervention WFPтАЩs Office of Evaluation (OEV) has received funding from the Gates Foundation to conduct a three-country study assessing the impact of Digital Financial Inclusion (DFI) and Nutritional Social Behavioral Change (SBC) on maternal- and child health outcomes using impact evaluation. As part of the workstream, OEV held internal consultations and reviewed expressions of interest (EOIs) from country offices. As a result of that process Bangladesh was selected as one of the three countries to be included in the study. These terms of reference outline the responsibilities and requirements of the Programme Policy Officer - Impact Evaluation Short term contract position for an impact evaluation focusing on one of the Gates Foundation projects for evidence generation in Bangladesh. The Bangladesh CO jointly with the Office of Evaluation (OEV) is in the process of planning a randomized trial to measure the impacts of a cash Top-up, paired with a joint Digital Financial Literacy and Nutritional Social Behavioral Change intervention, on maternal- and child health outcomes. The research design seeks to compare households receiving the top-up plus DFI & SBC training against households receiving only the top-up and/or basic regular allowances. Main outcome dimensions are food security, digital financial inclusion, nutritional intake, and other measures of maternal- and child health. Data for the IE is planned to be collected in at least 3 waves from approximately 4000+ randomly selected households starting around middle of 2026, ending 12 months after implementation of the programme. The overall study is intended to end April 2028. Click at the bottom of the job post to view the detailed Job Description (JD). To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 40 to 55 years Responsibilities & Context Job Context: Mithela Group is seeking a highly professional and self-driven Chief Executive Officer (Marketing) to lead its corporate marketing team. The ideal candidate will possess strong strategic vision, leadership ability, and a deep understanding of global market dynamics. The CEO (Marketing) will play a critical role in formulating and executing marketing strategies, enhancing brand positioning, and maintaining long-term relationships with international buyers to ensure sustainable business growth. Key Responsibilities: Develop and implement strategic marketing plans aligned. Strengthen brand identity and market positioning through participation in international trade fairs and direct buyer engagement. Establish and maintain effective communication with global buyers to identify business opportunities. Ensure optimal utilization of production capacity through accurate business projections.
